scripts.build: poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath dist --paths src
scripts.pkg:linux: cross-env-shell poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath $BUILD_OUTPUT/ai --name main --paths src --add-data="$CONFIG_PATH:config.json"
scripts.pkg:mac: cross-env-shell poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath $BUILD_OUTPUT/ai --name main --paths src --add-data="$CONFIG_PATH:config.json"
scripts.pkg:win: cross-env-shell poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath %BUILD_OUTPUT%\ai --name main.exe --paths src --add-data "%CONFIG_PATH%;config.json"
